channel.title: Weird Explorer on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Weird Explorer on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Seeds Are Better
item.description: [big]Of the many strange niches one can find on YouTube, the most interesting might be that spearheaded by Jared Rydelek, a man who has gained some notice on YouTube for tracking down rare kinds of fruit to try out. His channel, Weird Explorer, features him mostly talking about the weird fruits he’s eaten over the years, often while traveling. (It’s a very specific niche.)[/big] Clearly, this takes him a lot of strange directions, including in the direction of one of the most unusual-yet-common fruits you might find in the U.
